Apache Continuum 1.3.3 Release Notes
The Apache Continuum team is pleased to announce Apache Continuum 1.3.3.
Apache Continuum 1.3.3 includes the following new features:
Provide an audit log -- Ability to view in the log which user perform which function.
To learn more about how the Continuum dev team versions releases, see our release guidelines.
